nodes.text: Thresh-ahantu Azuloz was an individual who was a well-known enemy of the Jedi Grand Master Satele Shan, the leader of the Jedi Order, by the time of the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

Thresh-ahantu Azuloz's only mention was the 2012 reference guide Star Wars: The Old Republic Encyclopedia, where the individual is listed under a list of "Notorious Enemies" in the entry for Satele Shan.
